verses.verse: And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>, <S%G4134>full<s%> of the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%>, <S%G5290>returned<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G2446>Jordan<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> was <S%G71>led<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> the <S%G2048>wilderness<s%>

during <S%G3985><s%> <S%G5062>forty<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%>, <S%G3985>being<s%> <S%G3985>tempted<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> the <S%G1228>devil<s%>. <S%G2532>And<s%> he did <S%G5315>eat<s%> nothing3756, 3762 <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> when <S%G846>they<s%> were <S%G5305>completed<s%>, he <S%G3983>hungered<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G1228>devil<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G1487>if<s%> thou <S%G1488>art<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G2036>command<s%> <S%G5129>this<s%> <S%G3037>stone<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> it <S%G1096>become<s%> <S%G740>bread<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G3004>It<s%> is <S%G1125>written<s%>, <S%G444>Man<s%> <S%G2198>shall<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2198>live<s%> <S%G1909>by<s%> <S%G740>bread<s%> <S%G3441>alone<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1228>he<s%> <S%G321>led<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G321>up<s%>, <S%G3735>and<s%> <S%G1166>showed<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G932>kingdoms<s%> of the <S%G3625>world<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> a <S%G4743>moment<s%> of <S%G5550>time<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G1228>devil<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, To <S%G4671>thee<s%> will I <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G537>all<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1849>authority<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of <S%G846>them<s%>: for <S%G3754>it<s%> hath been <S%G3860>delivered<s%> unto <S%G1698>me<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G1437>whomsoever<s%> I <S%G2309>will<s%> I <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G3739>it<s%>.
If <S%G1437><s%> <S%G4771>thou<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> wilt <S%G4352>worship<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> <S%G3450>me<s%>, it shall <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G4675>thine<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, It is <S%G1125>written<s%>, Thou shalt <S%G4352>worship<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3441>only<s%> shalt thou <S%G3000>serve<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G71>led<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2419>Jerusalem<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2476>set<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G4419>pinnacle<s%> of the <S%G2411>temple<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G1487>If<s%> thou <S%G1488>art<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G906>cast<s%> <S%G4572>thyself<s%> <S%G2736>down<s%> from <S%G1782>hence<s%>:

for <S%G1063><s%> it is <S%G1125>written<s%>, He shall <S%G1781>give<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> <S%G1781>charge<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> <S%G4675>thee<s%>, to <S%G1314>guard<s%> <S%G3754>thee<s%>:

and <S%G2532><s%>, <S%G1909>On<s%> their <S%G5495>hands<s%> they shall <S%G142>bear<s%> <S%G4571>thee<s%> <S%G142>up<s%>, Lest <S%G3379>haply<s%> thou <S%G4350>dash<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G4228>foot<s%> <S%G4314>against<s%> a <S%G3754>stone<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answering<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, It is <S%G2046>said<s%>, Thou <S%G1598>shalt<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> make <S%G1598>trial<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G3754>God<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G4931>when<s%> the <S%G1228>devil<s%> had <S%G4931>completed<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G3986>temptation<s%>, he <S%G868>departed<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G891>for<s%> a <S%G2540>season<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5290>returned<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G1411>power<s%> of the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G1056>Galilee<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> a <S%G5345>fame<s%> went <S%G1831>out<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G2596>through<s%> <S%G3650>all<s%> the region round <S%G4012>about<s%>.
And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G1321>taught<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4864>synagogues<s%>, being <S%G1392>glorified<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3478>Nazareth<s%>, <S%G3757>where<s%> he had <S%G2258>been<s%> brought <S%G5142>up<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> he <S%G1525>entered<s%>, <S%G2596>as<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> custom <S%G1486>was<s%>, <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G4864>synagogue<s%> <S%G1722>on<s%> the <S%G4521>sabbath<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> stood <S%G450>up<s%> to <S%G314>read<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> there was <S%G1929>delivered<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%> the <S%G975>book<s%> of the <S%G4396>prophet<s%> <S%G2268>Isaiah<s%>. <S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G380>opened<s%> the <S%G975>book<s%>, and <S%G2147>found<s%> the <S%G5117>place<s%> <S%G3757>where<s%> it <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G1125>written<s%>,

The <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> is <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G1691>me<s%>, <S%G1752>Because<s%> he <S%G5548>anointed<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> to preach good <S%G2097>tidings<s%> to the <S%G4434>poor<s%>: He hath <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> to <S%G2784>proclaim<s%> <S%G859>release<s%> to the <S%G164>captives<s%>, <S%G2532>And<s%> recovering of <S%G309>sight<s%> to the <S%G5185>blind<s%>, To <S%G649>set<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G859>liberty<s%> them that are <S%G3739>bruised<s%>,
To <S%G2784>proclaim<s%> the <S%G1184>acceptable<s%> <S%G1763>year<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G4428>closed<s%> the <S%G975>book<s%>, and <S%G591>gave<s%> it <S%G591>back<s%> to the <S%G5257>attendant<s%>, and sat <S%G2523>down<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G3788>eyes<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4864>synagogue<s%> <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G816>fastened<s%> on <S%G846>him<s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G756>began<s%> to <S%G3004>say<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G4594>To-day<s%> <S%G4137>hath<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1124>scripture<s%> been <S%G4137>fulfilled<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3775>ears<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3140>bare<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3140>witness<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2296>wondered<s%> <S%G1909>at<s%> <S%G3056>the<s%> <S%G3056>words<s%> of <S%G5485>grace<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G1607>proceeded<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4750>mouth<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G3004>said<s%>, <S%G2076>Is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G2501>Joseph<s%>'s <S%G5207>son<s%>?

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G3843>Doubtless<s%> ye <S%G2046>will<s%> <S%G2046>say<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3850>parable<s%>, <S%G2395>Physician<s%>, <S%G2323>heal<s%> <S%G4572>thyself<s%>: <S%G3745>whatsoever<s%> we have <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G1096>done<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G2584>Capernaum<s%>, <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G5602>here<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> thine own <S%G3968>country<s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G2036>said<s%>, <S%G281>Verily<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%>, <S%G3762>No<s%> <S%G4396>prophet<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1184>acceptable<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> his <S%G846>own<s%> <S%G3968>country<s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1909>of<s%> a <S%G225>truth<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%>, There <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G5503>widows<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2474>Israel<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2250>days<s%> of <S%G2243>Elijah<s%>, <S%G3753>when<s%> the <S%G3772>heaven<s%> was shut up2808, Esther9 <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G2094>years<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1803>six<s%> <S%G3376>months<s%>, <S%G5613>when<s%> there <S%G1096>came<s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G3042>famine<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1093>land<s%>;

and <S%G2532><s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G3762>none<s%> of <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G3992>was<s%> <S%G2243>Elijah<s%> <S%G1487>sent<s%>, <S%G2532>but<s%> only <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G4558>Zarephath<s%>, in the land of <S%G4605>Sidon<s%>, <S%G4314>unto<s%> a <S%G1135>woman<s%> that was a <S%G5503>widow<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> there <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G3015>lepers<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2474>Israel<s%> in the <S%G1909>time<s%> of <S%G1666>Elisha<s%> the <S%G4396>prophet<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3762>none<s%> of <S%G846>them<s%> was <S%G1487>cleansed<s%>, <S%G3361>but<s%> only <S%G3497>Naaman<s%> the <S%G4948>Syrian<s%>.
And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3956>they<s%> were all <S%G4130>filled<s%> with <S%G2372>wrath<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4864>synagogue<s%>, as they <S%G191>heard<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%>;

and <S%G2532><s%> they rose <S%G450>up<s%>, and <S%G1544>cast<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> forth out <S%G1854>of<s%> the <S%G4172>city<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G71>led<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G2193>unto<s%> the <S%G3790>brow<s%> of the <S%G3735>hill<s%> <S%G1909>whereon<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4172>city<s%> was <S%G3618>built<s%>, <S%G1519>that<s%> they might <S%G2630>throw<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> down <S%G3739>headlong<s%>.
But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G1330>passing<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G3319>midst<s%> of <S%G846>them<s%> went his <S%G4198>way<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he came <S%G2718>down<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2584>Capernaum<s%>, a <S%G4172>city<s%> of <S%G1056>Galilee<s%>. <S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G1321>teaching<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1722>on<s%> the sabbath <S%G4521>day<s%>:

and <S%G2532><s%> they were <S%G1605>astonished<s%> <S%G1909>at<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1322>teaching<s%>; <S%G3754>for<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3056>word<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G1849>authority<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4864>synagogue<s%> there <S%G2258>was<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%>, that <S%G2192>had<s%> a <S%G4151>spirit<s%> of an <S%G169>unclean<s%> <S%G1140>demon<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> he cried <S%G349>out<s%> with a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice<s%>,

Ah <S%G5101><s%>! what have we to <S%G2254>do<s%> with <S%G4671>thee<s%>, <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> thou <S%G3479>Nazarene<s%>? art thou <S%G2064>come<s%> to <S%G622>destroy<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%>? I <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G4571>thee<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> thou <S%G1488>art<s%>, the Holy <S%G40>One<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2008>rebuked<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, Hold thy <S%G5392>peace<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> come <S%G1831>out<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>. And <S%G2532>when<s%> the <S%G1140>demon<s%> had <S%G4496>thrown<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> down <S%G1519>in<s%> the <S%G3319>midst<s%>, he <S%G1831>came<s%> out <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, having done <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3367>no<s%> <S%G984>hurt<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2285>amazement<s%> <S%G1096>came<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G4814>spake<s%> <S%G4314>together<s%>, one with <S%G240>another<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, <S%G5101>What<s%> is <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3056>word<s%>? <S%G3754>for<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G1849>authority<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1411>power<s%> he <S%G2004>commandeth<s%> the <S%G169>unclean<s%> <S%G4151>spirits<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> they come <S%G1831>out<s%>.
And <S%G2532><s%> there went <S%G1607>forth<s%> a <S%G2279>rumor<s%> concerning <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G5117>place<s%> of the region round <S%G4066>about<s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G450>rose<s%> <S%G450>up<s%> from the <S%G4864>synagogue<s%>, and <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3614>house<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G1161>Simon<s%>. And <S%G4613>Simon<s%>'s <S%G3994>wife<s%>'s mother <S%G2258>was<s%> holden <S%G4912>with<s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4446>fever<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G2065>besought<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G4012>for<s%> <S%G846>her<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G2186>stood<s%> <S%G1883>over<s%> <S%G846>her<s%>, and <S%G2008>rebuked<s%> the <S%G4446>fever<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> it <S%G863>left<s%> <S%G846>her<s%>: <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G3916>immediately<s%> she <S%G450>rose<s%> up and <S%G1247>ministered<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>.
